account.title: Account Settings
account.publicInfoSubtitle: Add your social media and contact information to let other users know about you

login.title: Sign In
login.subtitle: Sign in to your account
login.description: Only administrators and data providers need to log in. Regular users currently do not have login functionality. If you want to become a data provider, please contact Bobby via Email:ibobbyts@gmail.com.

intro.title: Quantified Cinematography
intro.description: Quantified Cinematography is a platform that collects technical specification test data for photography equipment, featuring easy-to-use visualizations.

user_management.title: User Management
user_management.description: Manage user accounts, permissions, and system settings. Only administrators can access this section.

manage_users.title: Manage Users
manage_users.subtitle: Manage user accounts, permissions, and system access

success_modal.title: User Created Successfully
success_modal.password_warning: Please save this password securely. It will not be shown again.

confirmations.disable_user: Are you sure you want to disable this user?
confirmations.delete_user: Are you sure you want to delete this user? This action cannot be undone.
confirmations.delete_user_message: Are you sure you want to delete user '{username}' ({nickname})? This will permanently remove the user and all their uploaded data. This action cannot be undone.
confirmations.reset_password_message: Are you sure you want to reset the password for user '{username}' ({nickname})? This will generate a new password and the user will need to use it to log in.
confirmations.disable_user_title: Are you sure you want to disable this user?
confirmations.disable_user_message: User {nickname}({username}) will be blocked from logging in, and any active sessions will be terminated immediately.
confirmations.enable_user_title: Are you sure you want to enable this user?
confirmations.enable_user_message: User {nickname}({username}) will have login access restored.

empty_state.title: No users
empty_state.description: Get started by creating a new user.

delete_failure.title: Failed to Delete User
delete_failure.message: User '{username}' could not be deleted. Error: {error}

cannot_delete_self.title: Cannot Delete Own Account
cannot_delete_self.message: You cannot delete your own account.

disable_failure.title: Failed to Update User Status
disable_failure.message: User '{username}' status could not be updated. Error: {error}

reset_password_failure.title: Failed to Reset Password
reset_password_failure.message: Password for user '{username}' could not be reset. Error: {error}

password_modal.title: Password Reset Successfully
password_modal.description: A new password has been generated for user '{username}'.
password_modal.password_warning: Please save this password securely. It will not be shown again.

recorded_lighting_products.title: Recorded Lighting Products: {count} models
recorded_lighting_products.description: This section contains comprehensive testing from multiple test bloggers on various lighting products. Click the button below to view all lights, with detailed test projects in the following cards.

data_upload.title: Data Upload
data_upload.description: Upload test data for various lighting tests.

products.title: Recorded Lighting Products: {count} models
products.description: This section contains comprehensive testing from multiple test bloggers on various lighting products. Click the button below to view all lights, with detailed test projects in the following cards.

brightness.title: Brightness Testing
brightness.description: Browse the actual illuminance and brightness change curves of lighting products at different color temperatures.

white_light_quality.title: White Light Quality Testing
white_light_quality.description: Test the quality of white light, including color temperature accuracy and color rendering metrics.

color_light.title: Color Light Testing
color_light.description: Browse illuminance, saturation and other information of colored lighting products.

manage.title: Manage Camera/Camcorder
manage.subtitle: Manage camera and camcorder product data

confirmations.delete_message: Are you sure you want to delete camera '{name}'? This action cannot be undone.

empty_state.title: No Cameras
empty_state.description: Get started by adding your first camera or camcorder.

add.title: Add Camera/Camcorder
add.subtitle: Add a new camera or camcorder to the database

form.model_help: Please confirm the product model naming style is consistent with existing models in the database.
form.cinema_help: Check for cinema camera, leave empty for still camera

batch_add.title: Batch Add
batch_add.instructions_1: Please upload a CSV file containing camera information.
batch_add.instructions_2: The file should contain the following columns: brand, model, release_year, cinema (Y/N).
batch_add.instructions_brands: Currently existing brands in the system:

preview.model_exists_tooltip: Camera model already exists, you can continue to submit, this camera will be automatically skipped, no error will occur.

add_modal.title: Add New Brand
add_modal.message: Please enter the name of the new brand:

warnings.check_duplicate: Please confirm the camera hasn't been added

products.title: Recorded {cameraCount} cameras, {cinemaCount} cinema cameras
products.button: Browse All Cameras and Cinema Cameras

dynamic_range.title: Dynamic Range Testing
dynamic_range.description: Includes Slope-based, SNR=1, SNR=2 and other dynamic range data

spectrometer.title: Manage Spectrometer
spectrometer.subtitle: This website focuses on lighting product testing, not spectrometers, so the spectrometer section is simplified. Only record the spectrometer name, which should include brand, model, etc. Others should be able to identify which specific product it is from the name, and this name refers to a **unique** product.

confirmations.delete_message: Are you sure you want to delete spectrometer '{name}'? This action cannot be undone.

empty_state.title: No spectrometers
empty_state.description: Get started by adding a new spectrometer.

add_modal.title: Add Spectrometer
add_modal.message: Please enter the spectrometer name, which should include brand, model, etc. The added spectrometer will be shared across the entire website. Ensure others can identify which specific product it is from the name, and this name refers to a **unique** spectrometer.
